definition: according to this/on the ground of the above/(formally introduces reported speech in writing)
according to/to act in accordance with/to depend on/to seize/to occupy

definition: to conclude (treaty, contract, agreement etc)/to set up (a rule etc)
to plan to/to draft (a plan)/to imitate/to assess/to compare/pseudo-
to purchase (from various places)/to acquire (a company)
